text: Arau sihamtaka yaâ€™te'i paba hatya karaiba, arau yi sthanara paraa sihamte tomalokaka bahiskara karaiche tomaloke'o se'i sthanara paraa sihamtaka bahiskara karaiba. (Jani thoraa) phitana hatya karaatakai'o sanghatika; arau machajidula haraamara ocarata tomaloke sihamtara lagata yud'dha nakaraiba yetiya laike sihamte tomalokara biraud'dhe tata yud'dha nakarae. Eteke yadi sihamte tomalokara biraud'dhe yud'dha karae tente tomaloke'o sihamtaka hatya karaiba, e'itorae'i kaphirasakalara parainama
